alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 26 at 3:26AM PDT until October 27 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Most of the Rogue, Illinois, and Applegate Valleys. Additionally, the southern portions of the Umpqua Valley. This includes the cities and communities of Medford, Talent, Ashland, Jacksonville, Butte Falls, Shady Cove, White City, Gold Hill, Rogue River, Applegate, Williams, Ruch, Grants Pass, Selma, Cave Junction, Obrien, Azalea, Glendale, and Tiller. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few colder spots, especially in the southern end of the Illinois Valley and along the hills could see temperatures reach freezing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County
